name: Dinosocial Distancing
description:
A little top-down shooter I made during the first French lock-down while sleeping on a friend's sofa near Brie (the town, not the cheese). It's pretty simple, but if nothing else the music goes a long way to communicating my emotional state during the initial stage of the pandemic.

Using the arrow keys, WASD or ZQSD to move and click to attack. 

Written in Haxe using the Heaps game engine.

You can find the code on github.
